If I delete an issue from my device, how do I get it back?

You can always download any issues you already own, they will be available to you forever. All you need to do is tap the cloud icon.

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

Call 0800 123 4567
Submit a support request

I forgot my password

To reset your Apple ID password go to https://iforgot.apple.com/password/verify/appleid

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

Call 0800 123 4567
Submit a support request

How do I get the cover gift?

As you might expect, cover gifts and other free items that come with the print edition aren’t included with the digital edition. In general, we don’t offer a way to get cover gifts but, if we do, instructions will be added in the digital edition

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

Call 0800 123 4567
Submit a support request

How do I archive or delete an issue from my device?

To remove an issue from your device follow these steps:

  1. Open the app menu and tap “Downloaded Issues”
  2. In the Downloaded Issues screen, tap “Edit” in the top right corner
  3. Select the issue(s) you want to archive by tapping the small circle to the left of the cover image
  4. Tap Remove” in the bottom right corner

You can always download any issues you already own, they will be available to you forever.

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

Call 0800 123 4567
Submit a support request

How can I download the issue to use outside of the app?

You cannot download any charts, patterns or other pages outside of the app. However, we do offer air printing with our craft apps. See “How can I print charts and patterns?”

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

Call 0800 123 4567
Submit a support request

All / Some of the pages are blurry

Unfortunately, sometimes files can get corrupted during download. When this happens, removing the issue and downloading it again will resolve the problem. Please see “How do I archive or delete an issue from my device?”

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

Call 0800 123 4567
